headline: Micron’s Shares Fall After Memory Chip Pricing Hits Margins
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Shares of Micron Technology Inc., the largest US maker of computer memory chips, fell after the company reported that margins will miss analysts’ estimates this quarter.
